overview: The third film in one of the most acclaimed all-sex series of all-time is back with D3viance, from award winning studio skinworXXX, Rock Star Entertainment and Adam & Eve Pictures. Returning to the world of filth and gloss are four of the stars who helped make the landmark first film, Alexis Texas, Teagan Presley, Lexi Belle and Eva Angelina. Director Joshua brings you three plus hours of five of the dirtiest scenes yet with double penetration, anal, and more! D3viance once again climaxes with a foursome of superstars that promises to topple the AVN-Award winning foursome scene from the first Deviance. D3viance also features AVN's Best New Starlet Brooklyn Lee, Ash Hollywood, Sophie Dee, Amy Brooke, and Kayla Carrera, who performs her first double penetration in a scene that will go down in history.
tagline: Return to the darkest realm of fantasy!
title: D3viance
